changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT T1.UsrID, T1.UsrLogin, T1.UsrPwd, T1.UserStaffID, T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName, T1.UsrMobile, T1.UsrEmail, T1.UsrEnabled, T1.UsrCanSignonFrom, T1.UsrCanSignonTo, T1.UsrCanOverrideLimits, T1.UsrAcExp, T1.UsrAcExpDt, T1.UsrCredentialsExp, T1.UsrAcLocked, T1.UsrLanguage, T1.UsrDftAppId, T2.AppCode AS LovDescUsrDftAppCode, T2.AppDescription AS LovDescUsrDftAppCodeName, T1.UsrBranchCode, T1.UsrDeptCode, T3.DeptDesc AS LovDescUsrDeptCodeName, T1.UsrToken, T1.UsrIsMultiBranch, T1.UsrInvldLoginTries, T1.Version, T1.LastMntBy, T1.LastMntOn, T1.RecordStatus, T1.RoleCode, T1.NextRoleCode, T1.TaskId, T1.NextTaskId, T1.RecordType, T1.WorkflowId, T1.UsrDftAppCode FROM PCF.dbo.SecUsers AS T1 INNER JOIN PCF.dbo.PTApplicationDetails AS T2 ON T1.UsrDftAppId = T2.AppID INNER JOIN PCF.dbo.BMTDepartments AS T3 ON T1.UsrDeptCode = T3.DeptCode

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView:
SELECT UsrID, UsrLogin, UsrFName, UsrMName, UsrLName
FROM public.dblink ('pcfserv','select UsrID,UsrLogin,USRFNAME,USRMNAME,USRLNAME from public.secusers') AS DATA(USRID BIGINT,UsrLogin CHARACTER VARYING,USRFNAME CHARACTER VARYING,USRMNAME CHARACTER VARYING,USRLNAME CHARACTER VARYING)

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.AddrTypeCode AS AftAddrTypeCode, AFT.AddrTypeDesc AS AftAddrTypeDesc, AFT.AddrTypePriority AS AftAddrTypePriority, AFT.AddrTypeActive AS AftAddrTypeActive, BEF.AddrTypeCode AS BefAddrTypeCode, BEF.AddrTypeDesc AS BefAddrTypeDesc, BEF.AddrTypePriority AS BefAddrTypePriority, BEF.AddrTypeActive AS BefAddrTypeActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTAddressTypes AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTAddressTypes AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'AddressType') AND (COALESCE(AFT.AddrTypeCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.AddrTypeCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.AddrTypeDesc, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.AddrTypeDesc,'') OR AFT.AddrTypePriority <> BEF.AddrTypePriority OR COALESCE(AFT.AddrTypeActive, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.AddrTypeActive, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.CollectorId AS AftCollectorId, AFT.TeamleadId AS AftTeamleadId, AFT.CollectorNameUserid AS AftCollectorNameUserid, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode, AFT.CollectorName AS AftCollectorName,AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.CollectorId AS BefCollectorId, BEF.TeamleadId AS BefTeamleadId, BEF.CollectorNameUserid AS BefCollectorNameUserid, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode, BEF.CollectorName AS BefCollectorName,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtCollectors AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtCollectors AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionCollector') AND (COALESCE(AFT.CollectorId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.CollectorId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TeamleadId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TeamleadId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.CollectorNameUserid, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.CollectorNameUserid,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.DeptCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.CollectorName, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.CollectorName,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, to_char(TH.AuditDate, 'DD-MON-YYYY') AS AuditDate, to_char( TH.AuditDate, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId, FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName, FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.CollectorId AS AftCollectorId, AFT.TeamleadId AS AftTeamleadId, AFT.CollectorNameUserid AS AftCollectorNameUserid, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode, AFT.CollectorName AS AftCollectorName,AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.CollectorId AS BefCollectorId, BEF.TeamleadId AS BefTeamleadId, BEF.CollectorNameUserid AS BefCollectorNameUserid, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode, BEF.CollectorName AS BefCollectorName,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN AdtCollectors AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN AdtCollectors AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionCollector') AND (COALESCE(cast(AFT.CollectorId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.CollectorId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.TeamleadId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.TeamleadId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.CollectorNameUserid as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.CollectorNameUserid as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.DeptCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.CollectorName, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.CollectorName,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.ManagerId AS AftManagerId, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode, AFT.ManagerUserId AS AftManagerUserId, AFT.ManagerName AS AftManagerName, AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.ManagerId AS BefManagerId, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode, BEF.ManagerUserId AS BefManagerUserId, BEF.ManagerName AS BefManagerName, BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtManagers AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtManagers AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionManager') AND (COALESCE(AFT.ManagerId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ManagerId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.DeptCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ManagerUserId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ManagerUserId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ManagerName, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ManagerName,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.ManagerId AS AftManagerId, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode, AFT.ManagerUserId AS AftManagerUserId, AFT.ManagerName AS AftManagerName, AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.ManagerId AS BefManagerId, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode, BEF.ManagerUserId AS BefManagerUserId, BEF.ManagerName AS BefManagerName, BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtManagers AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtManagers AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionManager') AND (COALESCE(cast(AFT.ManagerId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.ManagerId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.DeptCode as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.ManagerUserId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.ManagerUserId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ManagerName, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ManagerName,'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.Active as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.Active as varchar), ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.StrategyCode AS AftStrategyCode, AFT.StrategyType AS AftStrategyType, AFT.OverdueRangeNo AS AftOverdueRangeNo, AFT.TemplateId AS AftTemplateId, AFT.LngCode AS AftLngCode,AFT.TransferToAgency AS AftTransferToAgency, AFT.TransferToLegal AS AftTransferToLegal, BEF.StrategyCode AS BefStrategyCode, BEF.StrategyType AS BefStrategyType, BEF.OverdueRangeNo AS BefOverdueRangeNo, BEF.TemplateId AS BefTemplateId, BEF.LngCode AS BefLngCode,BEF.TransferToAgency AS BefTransferToAgency, BEF.TransferToLegal AS BefTransferToLegal FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtCollectionStrategyDetails AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtCollectionStrategyDetails AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionStrategyDetail') AND (COALESCE(AFT.StrategyCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.StrategyCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.StrategyType, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.StrategyType,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.OverdueRangeNo, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.OverdueRangeNo,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TemplateId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TemplateId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.LngCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.LngCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TransferToAgency, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TransferToAgency,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TransferToLegal, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TransferToLegal,''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.StrategyCode AS AftStrategyCode, AFT.StrategyType AS AftStrategyType, AFT.OverdueRangeNo AS AftOverdueRangeNo, AFT.TemplateId AS AftTemplateId, AFT.LngCode AS AftLngCode,AFT.TransferToAgency AS AftTransferToAgency, AFT.TransferToLegal AS AftTransferToLegal, BEF.StrategyCode AS BefStrategyCode, BEF.StrategyType AS BefStrategyType, BEF.OverdueRangeNo AS BefOverdueRangeNo, BEF.TemplateId AS BefTemplateId, BEF.LngCode AS BefLngCode,BEF.TransferToAgency AS BefTransferToAgency, BEF.TransferToLegal AS BefTransferToLegal FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtCollectionStrategyDetails AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtCollectionStrategyDetails AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionStrategyDetail') AND (COALESCE(AFT.StrategyCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.StrategyCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.StrategyType, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.StrategyType,'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.OverdueRangeNo as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.OverdueRangeNo as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.TemplateId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.TemplateId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.LngCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.LngCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TransferToAgency, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TransferToAgency,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TransferToLegal, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TransferToLegal,''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.TeamleadId AS AftTeamleadId, AFT.ManagerId AS AftManagerId, AFT.TeamleadNameUserid AS AftTeamleadNameUserid, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode, AFT.TeamleadName AS AftTeamleadName, AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.TeamleadId AS BefTeamleadId, BEF.ManagerId AS BefManagerId, BEF.TeamleadNameUserid AS BefTeamleadNameUserid, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode, BEF.TeamleadName AS BefTeamleadName,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtTeamLeads AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtTeamLeads AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionTeamLead') AND (COALESCE(cast(AFT.TeamleadId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.TeamleadId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.ManagerId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.ManagerId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.TeamleadNameUserid as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.TeamleadNameUserid as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.DeptCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TeamleadName, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TeamleadName,'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.Active as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.Active as varchar), ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.TeamleadId AS AftTeamleadId, AFT.ManagerId AS AftManagerId, AFT.TeamleadNameUserid AS AftTeamleadNameUserid, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode, AFT.TeamleadName AS AftTeamleadName, AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.TeamleadId AS BefTeamleadId, BEF.ManagerId AS BefManagerId, BEF.TeamleadNameUserid AS BefTeamleadNameUserid, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode, BEF.TeamleadName AS BefTeamleadName,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtTeamLeads AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtTeamLeads AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectionTeamLead') AND (COALESCE(AFT.TeamleadId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TeamleadId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ManagerId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ManagerId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TeamleadNameUserid, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TeamleadNameUserid,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.DeptCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.TeamleadName, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.TeamleadName,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, Aft.CollInctId as AftCollInctId, Aft.CollectorId as AftCollectorId, Aft.FromDate as AftFromDate, Aft.ToDate as AftToDate, Aft.CollectedAmount as AftCollectedAmount, Aft.InctCode as AftInctCode, Aft.InctAmount as AftInctAmount, Aft.InctPaidDate as AftInctPaidDate, Bef.CollInctId as BefCollInctId, Bef.CollectorId as BefCollectorId, Bef.FromDate as BefFromDate, Bef.ToDate as BefToDate, Bef.CollectedAmount as BefCollectedAmount, Bef.InctCode as BefInctCode, Bef.InctAmount as BefInctAmount, Bef.InctPaidDate as BefInctPaidDate FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTCollectorIncentives AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTCollectorIncentives AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'CollectorIncentive')

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView:
SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.ContactCodeId AS AftContactCodeId, AFT.Contactcode AS AftContactcode, AFT.Description AS AftDescription, AFT.ContactCodeGroup AS AftContactCodeGroup, AFT.DefaultFollowup AS AftDefaultFollowup,AFT.MinimumFollowUp AS AftMinimumFollowUp, AFT.MaxFollowUp AS AftMaxFollowUp, AFT.LetterToBeSent AS AftLetterToBeSent, AFT.LetterCode AS AftLetterCode, AFT.SMSToBeSent AS AftSMSToBeSent, AFT.SMSCode AS AftSMSCode,AFT.ReviewCode AS AftReviewCode,
AFT.PTPRequired AS AftPTPRequired, AFT.NotesMandatory AS AftNotesMandatory, AFT.Remarks AS AftRemarks,AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.ContactCodeId AS BefContactCodeId, BEF.Contactcode AS BefContactcode, BEF.Description AS BefDescription, BEF.ContactCodeGroup AS BefContactCodeGroup, BEF.DefaultFollowup AS BefDefaultFollowup,BEF.MinimumFollowUp AS BefMinimumFollowUp, BEF.MaxFollowUp AS BefMaxFollowUp, BEF.LetterToBeSent AS BefLetterToBeSent, BEF.LetterCode AS BefLetterCode, BEF.SMSToBeSent AS BefSMSToBeSent, BEF.SMSCode AS BefSMSCode,BEF.ReviewCode AS BefReviewCode, BEF.PTPRequired AS BefPTPRequired, BEF.NotesMandatory AS BefNotesMandatory, BEF.Remarks AS BefRemarks,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtContactCodes AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtContactCodes AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'ContactCode') AND (COALESCE(AFT.Contactcode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Contactcode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ContactCodeId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ContactCodeId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ContactCodeGroup, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ContactCodeGroup,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Description, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Description,'') OR AFT.MinimumFollowUp <> BEF.MinimumFollowUp OR AFT.DefaultFollowup <> BEF.DefaultFollowup OR COALESCE(AFT.LetterToBeSent, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.LetterToBeSent,'') OR AFT.MaxFollowUp <> BEF.MaxFollowUp OR COALESCE(AFT.SMSToBeSent, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.SMSToBeSent,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.LetterCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.LetterCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ReviewCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ReviewCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.SMSCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.SMSCode, '') OR COALESCE(AFT.NotesMandatory, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.NotesMandatory,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PTPRequired, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PTPRequired,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Remarks, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Remarks,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView:
SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.ContactCodeId AS AftContactCodeId, AFT.Contactcode AS AftContactcode, AFT.Description AS AftDescription, AFT.ContactCodeGroup AS AftContactCodeGroup, AFT.DefaultFollowup AS AftDefaultFollowup,AFT.MinimumFollowUp AS AftMinimumFollowUp, AFT.MaxFollowUp AS AftMaxFollowUp, AFT.LetterToBeSent AS AftLetterToBeSent, AFT.LetterCode AS AftLetterCode, AFT.SMSToBeSent AS AftSMSToBeSent, AFT.SMSCode AS AftSMSCode,AFT.ReviewCode AS AftReviewCode,
AFT.PTPRequired AS AftPTPRequired, AFT.NotesMandatory AS AftNotesMandatory, AFT.Remarks AS AftRemarks,AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.ContactCodeId AS BefContactCodeId, BEF.Contactcode AS BefContactcode, BEF.Description AS BefDescription, BEF.ContactCodeGroup AS BefContactCodeGroup, BEF.DefaultFollowup AS BefDefaultFollowup,BEF.MinimumFollowUp AS BefMinimumFollowUp, BEF.MaxFollowUp AS BefMaxFollowUp, BEF.LetterToBeSent AS BefLetterToBeSent, BEF.LetterCode AS BefLetterCode, BEF.SMSToBeSent AS BefSMSToBeSent, BEF.SMSCode AS BefSMSCode,BEF.ReviewCode AS BefReviewCode, BEF.PTPRequired AS BefPTPRequired, BEF.NotesMandatory AS BefNotesMandatory, BEF.Remarks AS BefRemarks,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtContactCodes AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtContactCodes AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'ContactCode') AND (COALESCE(AFT.Contactcode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Contactcode,'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.ContactCodeId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.ContactCodeId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ContactCodeGroup, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ContactCodeGroup,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Description, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Description,'') OR AFT.MinimumFollowUp <> BEF.MinimumFollowUp OR AFT.DefaultFollowup <> BEF.DefaultFollowup OR COALESCE(AFT.LetterToBeSent, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.LetterToBeSent,'') OR AFT.MaxFollowUp <> BEF.MaxFollowUp OR COALESCE(AFT.SMSToBeSent, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.SMSToBeSent,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.LetterCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.LetterCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ReviewCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ReviewCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.SMSCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.SMSCode, '') OR COALESCE(AFT.NotesMandatory, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.NotesMandatory,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PTPRequired, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PTPRequired,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Remarks, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Remarks,'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.Active as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.Active as varchar), ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.PromiseCode AS AftPromiseCode, AFT.PromiseCodeDesc AS AftPromiseCodeDesc, AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.PromiseCode AS BefPromiseCode, BEF.PromiseCodeDesc AS BefPromiseCodeDesc, BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPromiseCode AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPromiseCode AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'PromiseCode') AND (COALESCE(AFT.PromiseCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PromiseCode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PromiseCodeDesc, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PromiseCodeDesc,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.PromiseCount AS AftPromiseCount, AFT.QueueId AS AftQueueId, AFT.RefNo AS AftRefNo, AFT.PTPcode AS AftPTPcode, AFT.PromiseFreqCode AS AftPromiseFreqCode,AFT.PayAmount AS AftPayAmount, AFT.NoofPayments AS AftNoofPayments,AFT.PromiseStatus AS AftPromiseStatus, AFT.DatePayArrStrtDate AS AftDatePayArrStrtDate, BEF.PromiseCount AS BefPromiseCount, BEF.QueueId AS BefQueueId, BEF.RefNo AS BefRefNo, BEF.PTPcode AS BefPTPcode, BEF.PromiseFreqCode AS BefPromiseFreqCode,BEF.PayAmount AS BefPayAmount, BEF.NoofPayments AS BefNoofPayments,BEF.PromiseStatus AS BefPromiseStatus, BEF.DatePayArrStrtDate AS BefDatePayArrStrtDate FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPromiseLog AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPromiseLog AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'PromiseLog') AND (COALESCE(AFT.PromiseCount, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PromiseCount,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.QueueId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.QueueId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.RefNo, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.RefNo,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PTPcode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PTPcode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PromiseFreqCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PromiseFreqCode,'') OR AFT.PayAmount<> BEF.PayAmount OR COALESCE(AFT.NoofPayments, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.NoofPayments,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PromiseStatus, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PromiseStatus,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.DatePayArrStrtDate, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DatePayArrStrtDate,''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, to_char(TH.AuditDate, 'DD-MON-YYYY') AS AuditDate, to_char( TH.AuditDate, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId, FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName, FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.PromiseCount AS AftPromiseCount, AFT.QueueId AS AftQueueId, AFT.RefNo AS AftRefNo, AFT.PTPcode AS AftPTPcode, AFT.PromiseFreqCode AS AftPromiseFreqCode,AFT.PayAmount AS AftPayAmount, AFT.NoofPayments AS AftNoofPayments,AFT.PromiseStatus AS AftPromiseStatus, AFT.DatePayArrStrtDate AS AftDatePayArrStrtDate, BEF.PromiseCount AS BefPromiseCount, BEF.QueueId AS BefQueueId, BEF.RefNo AS BefRefNo, BEF.PTPcode AS BefPTPcode, BEF.PromiseFreqCode AS BefPromiseFreqCode,BEF.PayAmount AS BefPayAmount, BEF.NoofPayments AS BefNoofPayments,BEF.PromiseStatus AS BefPromiseStatus, BEF.DatePayArrStrtDate AS BefDatePayArrStrtDate FROM AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN AdtPromiseLog AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN AdtPromiseLog AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'PromiseLog') AND (COALESCE(cast(AFT.PromiseCount as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.PromiseCount as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.QueueId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.QueueId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.RefNo, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.RefNo,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PTPcode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PTPcode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PromiseFreqCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PromiseFreqCode,'') OR AFT.PayAmount<> BEF.PayAmount OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.NoofPayments as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.NoofPayments as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.PromiseStatus, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PromiseStatus,'') OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.DatePayArrStrtDate as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.DatePayArrStrtDate as varchar),''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.QCategorycode AS AftQCategorycode, AFT.QCategoryDesc AS AftQCategoryDesc, AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.QCategorycode AS BefQCategorycode, BEF.QCategoryDesc AS BefQCategoryDesc, BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtQueueCategories AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtQueueCategories AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'QueueCategory') AND (COALESCE(AFT.QCategorycode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.QCategorycode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.QCategoryDesc, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.QCategoryDesc,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView:
SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType,
AFT.QueueId AS AftQueueId, AFT.Description AS AftDescription, AFT.CategoryCode AS AftCategoryCode, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode,AFT.PriorityValue AS AftPriorityValue, AFT.Remarks AS AftRemarks, AFT.QueueOwner AS AftQueueOwner,AFT.SelectionCriteria AS AftSelectionCriteria, AFT.SortOrder as AftSortOrder, AFT.LetterTemplate as AftLetterTemplate,AFT.AddrTypeCode AS AftAddrTypeCode, AFT.SMSTemplate AS AftSMSTemplate, AFT.EmailTemplate AS AftEmailTemplate, AFT.AssignmenType AS AftAssignmenType, AFT.PushToPDialer AS AftPushToPDialer,AFT.Toleranceid AS AftToleranceid,
BEF.QueueId AS BefQueueId, BEF.Description AS BefDescription, BEF.CategoryCode AS BefCategoryCode, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode,BEF.PriorityValue AS BefPriorityValue, BEF.Remarks AS BefRemarks, BEF.QueueOwner AS BefQueueOwner,BEF.SelectionCriteria AS BefSelectionCriteria, Bef.SortOrder as BefSortOrder, Bef.LetterTemplate as BefLetterTemplate,BEF.AddrTypeCode AS BefAddrTypeCode, BEF.SMSTemplate AS BefSMSTemplate, BEF.EmailTemplate AS BefEmailTemplate, BEF.AssignmenType AS BefAssignmenType, BEF.PushToPDialer AS BefPushToPDialer,BEF.Toleranceid AS BefToleranceid
FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTQueues AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTQueues AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'Queue') AND (COALESCE(AFT.QueueId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.QueueId,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.Description, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Description,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.CategoryCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.CategoryCode,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.DeptCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'')OR AFT.PriorityValue <> BEF.PriorityValue OR COALESCE(AFT.Remarks, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Remarks,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.QueueOwner, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.QueueOwner,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.SelectionCriteria, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.SelectionCriteria,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.AddrTypeCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.AddrTypeCode,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.SMSTemplate, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.SMSTemplate,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.EmailTemplate, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.EmailTemplate,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.AssignmenType, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.AssignmenType,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.PushToPDialer, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PushToPDialer,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.Toleranceid, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Toleranceid,''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView:
SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, to_char(TH.AuditDate, 'DD-MON-YYYY') AS AuditDate, to_char( TH.AuditDate, 'HH24:MI:SS') AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId, FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName, FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType,
AFT.QueueId AS AftQueueId, AFT.Description AS AftDescription, AFT.CategoryCode AS AftCategoryCode, AFT.DeptCode AS AftDeptCode,AFT.PriorityValue AS AftPriorityValue, AFT.Remarks AS AftRemarks, AFT.QueueOwner AS AftQueueOwner,AFT.SelectionCriteria AS AftSelectionCriteria, AFT.SortOrder as AftSortOrder, AFT.LetterTemplate as AftLetterTemplate,AFT.AddrTypeCode AS AftAddrTypeCode, AFT.SMSTemplate AS AftSMSTemplate, AFT.EmailTemplate AS AftEmailTemplate, AFT.AssignmenType AS AftAssignmenType, AFT.PushToPDialer AS AftPushToPDialer,AFT.Toleranceid AS AftToleranceid,
BEF.QueueId AS BefQueueId, BEF.Description AS BefDescription, BEF.CategoryCode AS BefCategoryCode, BEF.DeptCode AS BefDeptCode,BEF.PriorityValue AS BefPriorityValue, BEF.Remarks AS BefRemarks, BEF.QueueOwner AS BefQueueOwner,BEF.SelectionCriteria AS BefSelectionCriteria, Bef.SortOrder as BefSortOrder, Bef.LetterTemplate as BefLetterTemplate,BEF.AddrTypeCode AS BefAddrTypeCode, BEF.SMSTemplate AS BefSMSTemplate, BEF.EmailTemplate AS BefEmailTemplate, BEF.AssignmenType AS BefAssignmenType, BEF.PushToPDialer AS BefPushToPDialer,BEF.Toleranceid AS BefToleranceid
FROM AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ADTQueues AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ADTQueues AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'Queue') AND (COALESCE(cast(AFT.QueueId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.QueueId as varchar),'')OR COALESCE(AFT.Description, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Description,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.CategoryCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.CategoryCode,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.DeptCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.DeptCode,'')OR AFT.PriorityValue <> BEF.PriorityValue OR COALESCE(AFT.Remarks, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Remarks,'')OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.QueueOwner as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.QueueOwner as varchar),'')OR COALESCE(AFT.SelectionCriteria, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.SelectionCriteria,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.AddrTypeCode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.AddrTypeCode,'')OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.SMSTemplate as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.SMSTemplate as varchar),'')OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.EmailTemplate as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.EmailTemplate as varchar),'')OR COALESCE(AFT.AssignmenType, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.AssignmenType,'')OR COALESCE(AFT.PushToPDialer, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.PushToPDialer,'')OR COALESCE(cast(AFT.Toleranceid as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.Toleranceid as varchar),''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, Aft.RepoId as AftRepoId, Aft.QueueId as AftQueueId, Aft.AssertType as AftAssertType, Aft.CustId as AftCustId, Aft.RefNo as AftRefNo, Aft.OverdueAmt as AftOverdueAmt, Aft.OutstandingDbtAmt as AftOutstandingDbtAmt, Aft.DbtCurrency as AftDbtCurrency, Aft.AssertMrktValue as AftAssertMrktValue, Aft.TotalCharges as AftTotalCharges, Aft.AmtRecovered as AftAmtRecovered, Aft.DepreciationAllowed as AftDepreciationAllowed, Aft.GainOrLossAdj as AftGainOrLossAdj, Aft.TranCurrency as AftTranCurrency, Aft.StrategyCode as AftStrategyCode, Aft.ContactCode as AftContactCode, Aft.ProcessDate as AftProcessDate, Aft.RepoDate as AftRepoDate, Aft.AgencyName as AftAgencyName, Aft.AddLocalpolice as AftAddLocalpolice, Aft.EmailLocalpolice as AftEmailLocalpolice, Aft.GarageOrwarehouseName as AftGarageOrwarehouseName, Aft.Remarks as AftRemarks, Aft.FreeText1 as AftFreeText1, Aft.FreeText2 as AftFreeText2, Aft.FreeText3 as AftFreeText3, Aft.FreeText4 as AftFreeText4, Aft.Status as AftStatus, Bef.RepoId as BefRepoId, Bef.QueueId as BefQueueId, Bef.AssertType as BefAssertType, Bef.CustId as BefCustId, Bef.RefNo as BefRefNo, Bef.OverdueAmt as BefOverdueAmt, Bef.OutstandingDbtAmt as BefOutstandingDbtAmt, Bef.DbtCurrency as BefDbtCurrency, Bef.AssertMrktValue as BefAssertMrktValue, Bef.TotalCharges as BefTotalCharges, Bef.AmtRecovered as BefAmtRecovered, Bef.DepreciationAllowed as BefDepreciationAllowed, Bef.GainOrLossAdj as BefGainOrLossAdj, Bef.TranCurrency as BefTranCurrency, Bef.StrategyCode as BefStrategyCode, Bef.ContactCode as BefContactCode, Bef.ProcessDate as BefProcessDate, Bef.RepoDate as BefRepoDate, Bef.AgencyName as BefAgencyName, Bef.AddLocalpolice as BefAddLocalpolice, Bef.EmailLocalpolice as BefEmailLocalpolice, Bef.GarageOrwarehouseName as BefGarageOrwarehouseName, Bef.Remarks as BefRemarks, Bef.FreeText1 as BefFreeText1, Bef.FreeText2 as BefFreeText2, Bef.FreeText3 as BefFreeText3, Bef.FreeText4 as BefFreeText4, Bef.Status as BefStatus FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTRepossessionDetails AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}ADTRepossessionDetails AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'RepossessionDetail')

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.ToleranceId AS AftToleranceId, AFT.Tolerancecode AS AftTolerancecode, AFT.ToleranceDesc AS AftToleranceDesc, AFT.ToleranceAmt AS AftToleranceAmt, AFT.AllowedPercent AS AftAllowedPercent,AFT.Remarks AS AftRemarks, AFT.ToleranceDays AS AftToleranceDays,AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.ToleranceId AS BefToleranceId, BEF.Tolerancecode AS BefTolerancecode, BEF.ToleranceDesc AS BefToleranceDesc, BEF.ToleranceAmt AS BefToleranceAmt, BEF.AllowedPercent AS BefAllowedPercent,BEF.Remarks AS BefRemarks, BEF.ToleranceDays AS BefToleranceDays ,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPTPTolerances AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPTPTolerances AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'Tolerance') AND (COALESCE(AFT.ToleranceId, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ToleranceId,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Tolerancecode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Tolerancecode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ToleranceDesc, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ToleranceDesc,'') OR AFT.ToleranceAmt <> BEF.ToleranceAmt OR AFT.AllowedPercent <> BEF.AllowedPercent OR COALESCE(AFT.Remarks, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Remarks,'') OR AFT.ToleranceDays <> BEF.ToleranceDays OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))

changeSet.author: pcfadmin
changeSet.createView: SELECT TH.AuditId, TH.AuditDate AS AuditDateTime, ${call.adtdate} AS AuditDate, ${call.adttime} AS AuditTime, COALESCE(AFT.AuditSeq, BEF.AuditSeq) AS AuditSeq, TH.AuditUsrId,${add.schema}FN_CustomerName(T1.UsrFName, T1.UsrMName, T1.UsrLName) AS AuditUserName,${add.schema}FN_TranType(TH.AuditTranType) AS AuditTranType, AFT.ToleranceId AS AftToleranceId, AFT.Tolerancecode AS AftTolerancecode, AFT.ToleranceDesc AS AftToleranceDesc, AFT.ToleranceAmt AS AftToleranceAmt, AFT.AllowedPercent AS AftAllowedPercent,AFT.Remarks AS AftRemarks, AFT.ToleranceDays AS AftToleranceDays,AFT.Active AS AftActive, BEF.ToleranceId AS BefToleranceId, BEF.Tolerancecode AS BefTolerancecode, BEF.ToleranceDesc AS BefToleranceDesc, BEF.ToleranceAmt AS BefToleranceAmt, BEF.AllowedPercent AS BefAllowedPercent,BEF.Remarks AS BefRemarks, BEF.ToleranceDays AS BefToleranceDays ,BEF.Active AS BefActive FROM ${add.schema}AuditHeader AS TH INNER JOIN ${add.schema}SecUsers_View AS T1 ON TH.AuditUsrId = T1.UsrID LEFT OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPTPTolerances AS AFT ON TH.AuditId = AFT.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = AFT.AuditDate AND AFT.AuditImage = 'A' FULL OUTER JOIN ${add.schema}AdtPTPTolerances AS BEF ON TH.AuditId = BEF.AuditId AND TH.AuditDate = BEF.AuditDate AND BEF.AuditImage = 'B' WHERE (TH.AuditTranType <> 'W') AND (TH.AuditModule = 'Tolerance') AND (COALESCE(cast(AFT.ToleranceId as varchar), '') <> COALESCE(cast(BEF.ToleranceId as varchar),'') OR COALESCE(AFT.Tolerancecode, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Tolerancecode,'') OR COALESCE(AFT.ToleranceDesc, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.ToleranceDesc,'') OR AFT.ToleranceAmt <> BEF.ToleranceAmt OR AFT.AllowedPercent <> BEF.AllowedPercent OR COALESCE(AFT.Remarks, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Remarks,'') OR AFT.ToleranceDays <> BEF.ToleranceDays OR COALESCE(AFT.Active, '') <> COALESCE(BEF.Active, ''))
